reviewtext: These binoculars arrived with problems and I returned them:- the right-lens diopter is very iffy and difficult to adjust. In fact, I never was able to get a satisfactory focus with it.- both lenses displayed significant distortion around the outside edges- It was impossible to clearly focus on anything beyond 50 yards- the quick focus mechanism frequently failed to work and took a few tries to adjustUnfortunately I had some similar problems with recently purchased Bushnell 20x50 wide angle binoculars. Bushnell used to be an inexpensive and decent brand.  Not anymore.
